subject: Super Bowl
Television
Ratings and Rating Systems
Football
lead_paragraph: After a preliminary calculation Monday that the Super Bowl on NBC attracted average viewership of 95.4 million, the second-most ever, Nielsen Media Research on Tuesday changed the estimate of those watching Pittsburgh beat Arizona to 98.7 million, beating last year’s previous high of 97.5 million on Fox.
